tag_list: loyalty, coupons, wallet, barcode, offers, rewards
overview:
tracknose is a single-product company developing ‘1Card’, a virtual wallet app which handles loyalty / rewards cards and mobile coupons on your smartphone. Why go around with a load of cards in your wallet? Donâ€™t you sometimes leave your cards at home? With 1Card you have everything with you on your smartphone!

++ BARCODE CARDS ++

1Card allows you to:

  • transform the barcode cards you ALREADY have into virtual cards: Loyalty, Rewards, Gift, Saving, Club, Membership cards, or any other physical card showing either a barcode or a regular number. Simply scan the barcode number that is on each card;

  • get NEW Loyalty / Rewards Cards directly from the chain stores joining the service.

When you select the Wallet item, all your cards will appear as if they were tucked in the pockets of your wallet. Simply click on the one you need to display the barcode and scan it under the reader at the checkout.

++ MOBILE COUPONS ++

Get to one of the places marked on the map and collect mobile coupons to be used at the checkout with immediate benefits. Display the barcodes for the coupon on your smartphone and have them scanned to use at the checkout.

++ 1CARD FOR CHAIN STORES ++

You’re a retailer / chain store? Start your MARKETING CAMPAIGNS online, using the 1Card back-end system. Go to www.tracknose.com, activate your Loyalty program, place your coupons on the map, and monitor your Stats & Analytics. The back-end system in synchronized with the 1Card app in real time.
